segments.text: Hello , Lucy , I heard you did a good deal in interview .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: What did you do in the interview ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I observed the interviewer's manner , mien and gesture carefully besides paying attention to mine .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Are all these helpful for the interview ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Of course . The manner of shaking hands can show a man â€™ s character . For example , the interviewer who shakes your hand lightly , is a easygoing man although he looks cool .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: You can discover interviewer's eyes because they can show his thoughts , and can judge whether he is interested in your words by his gesture and mien .
segments.speaker: S2
